gmd:organisationName.gco:CharacterString: DOC/NOAA/NESDIS/NCEI > National Centers for Environmental Information, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce
Scientific Data Stewardship provided by the National Geophysical Data Center, NESDIS, NOAA, U.S. Department of Commerce.

gmd:abstract.gco:CharacterString: The Sunjammer Project is a NASA funded contract to L???Garde Inc. to fly a solar sail demonstration for a period of approximately one year. L???Garde is also partnered in this mission with Space Services Holdings Inc. (SSHI) who will conduct all commercial activities associated with the mission such as memorial services, advertising, sponsorship (SSHI fill in) NASA will provide a government frequency allocation for the conduct of this mission. NASA, as the government user of the government acquired frequency will maintain authority to terminate the mission transmissions throughout the operating life of the Sunjammer mission.

gmd:purpose.gco:CharacterString: To provide scientific data stewardship of solar-terrestrial datasets in compliance with NOAA Administrative Order (NAO) 212-15, "Management of Environmental and Geospatial Data and Information", dated 04 Nov 10. Scientific Data Stewardship includes the Archive, Access, and Assessment (AAA) of operational and related solar and space environmental datasets.

gmd:credit.gco:CharacterString: Data access provided by the NOAA Solar and Terrestrial Physics Division.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Numerous datasets pertaining to space environmental measurements.

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: Numerous space environmental datasets are available at the website.

gmd:other.gco:CharacterString: NOAA National Centers for Environmental Information

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: NOAA created the National Centers for Environmental Information (NCEI) by merging NOAA's National Climatic Data Center (NCDC), National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC), and National Oceanographic Data Center (NODC), including the National Coastal Data Development Center (NCDDC), per the Consolidated and Further Continuing Appropriations Act, 2015, Public Law 113-235. NCEI launched publicly on April 22, 2015.

gmd:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: SunJammer is scheduled to be launched in 1QFY14.
SunJammer will measure properties of the solar wind and the Interplanetary Magnetic Field (IMF) from 2 x L1 Lagrangian Point.

gmd:measureDescription.gco:CharacterString: SunJammer is the NASA technology demonstration program to test the feasibility of solar sails for future spacecraft missions. SunJammer will also measure properties of the solar wind and interplanetary magnetic field at 2 x L1.

gmd:evaluationMethodDescription.gco:CharacterString: SunJammer satellite operations will be managed by L'Garde Inc. [DQ_AbsoluteExternalPositionalAccuracy]
Sunjammer will provide 1-to-2 hour advanced warnings of deleterious solar weather conditions.
SunJammer measurements will be tagged to Univeral Time Coordinated (UTC). Accuracy is presently unknown - TBD.

gmd:statement.gco:CharacterString: SunJammer data and products provided by the NOAA/NESDIS National Geophysical Data Center (NGDC) in coorperation with NOAA/NWS Space Weather Prediction Center (SWPC).

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: The NOAA/NGDC Solar and Terrestrial Physics Division (STP).

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Collection included as a part of the NGDC Official Archive.

gmd:alternateTitle.gco:CharacterString: Space Weather > Satellite Data > Solar Wind

gml:TimePeriod.gml:description: SunJammer is a 2-year [TBD] technology demonstration program having a launch date in 4QCY2014

gmd:title.gco:CharacterString: Data and information provided by the NOAA National Geophysical Data Center, Solar and Terrestrial Physics Division.

gmd:name.gco:CharacterString: NOAA/NGDC Solar and Terrestrial Physics Division

gmd:description.gco:CharacterString: The Solar - Terrestrial Physics (STP) Division of NGDC provides scientific stewardship of NOAA's space weather data and products, geomagnetic observatory and station data, and nighttime observations of the Earth.

gmd:dataset.gco:CharacterString: The SunJammer metadata will be updated as needed and reviewed at least annually.

gmd:maintenanceNote.gco:CharacterString: This metadata was automatically generated from the Content Standard for Digital Geospatial Metadata: Extensions for Remote Sensing Metadata standard version FGDC-STD-012-2002 using the June 2011 version of the FGDC RSE to ISO 19115-2 transform. The Spatial Reference Information is not currently mapped over to ISO but will be mapped in future versions.
This record was automatically modified on 2015-10-02 to include references to NCEI where applicable.
